-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET
System.import(function (out)
  ET = out.ET
end)
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("Game", function (namespace)
    local getEventSystem, scene, getScene, getObjectPool, Close
    getEventSystem = function ()
      return ET.EventSystem.getInstance()
    end
    getScene = function ()
      local default = scene
      if default == nil then
        scene = ET.EntitySceneFactory.CreateScene1(1, ET.SceneType.Process, "Process")
        default = scene
      end
      return default
    end
    getObjectPool = function ()
      return ET.ObjectPool.getInstance()
    end
    Close = function ()
      local default = scene
      if default ~= nil then
        default:Dispose()
      end
      scene = nil
      ET.ObjectPool.getInstance():Dispose()
      ET.EventSystem.getInstance():Dispose()
    end
    return {
      getEventSystem = getEventSystem,
      getScene = getScene,
      getObjectPool = getObjectPool,
      Close = Close
    }
  end)
end)
